about_the_game:
When a soul got a robot, it woken up, and there were already bad souls who wanted a revenge. when the right soul got to the right robot, he took the close weapon to him, and start shooting the bad soul until no robot is left.

features

  • Stat pill: take it if you want to add or remove values to some stats, that way changing the gameplay to your decision.
  • Items: you can choose it to activate certain abilities, like bigger bullets.
  • A wave is done after certain bots are killed.
detailed_description:

name: AlphaBit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
